Major_Arcs.title: The Circus and the Strongman
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Paul Bunyan in a circus setting, his confrontation with antagonists, and his rise to become the circus's new strongman, culminating in a dramatic showdown and his departure.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Performance and Arrival
sub_scenes.description: The circus arrives in town and Paul Bunyan performs, exciting the local townspeople who come to marvel at the exotic animals and performances.

sub_scenes.title: Trouble and Confrontation in the Tent
sub_scenes.description: Sounds of trouble draw attention to a tent where a confrontation unfolds, revealing a challenge to the 'strongest man in the world'.

sub_scenes.title: Recruitment and New Identity
sub_scenes.description: The strong man's actions lead to a conversation with the circus owner, revealing the backstory of Grasso and a job offer, which the strong man accepts, becoming Paul Bunyan.

sub_scenes.title: Grasso's Revenge and Foiled Sabotage
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan's success as the new strongman fuels Grasso's envy, leading to sabotage attempts that Paul skillfully thwarts.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Acclaim and Grasso's Envy

sub_scenes.title: Ape Chaos and The Chase
sub_scenes.description: Grasso's next sabotage involves releasing a large ape, leading to chaos and a chase where Paul Bunyan pursues Grasso.

sub_scenes.title: Arena Confrontation and Departure
sub_scenes.description: The chase enters the arena where Grasso attempts to use objects as weapons against Paul, culminating in his capture and Paul's decision to leave the circus.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Arena and New Plan
Bucket as a Trick and Continued Escape
The Turn to Fight and Capture
The Trapeze Toss and Audience Reaction

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo and the Ogress of Tibet
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Marco Polo's encounter with the Awful Ogress of Tibet, his intervention to help a talking severed head, and his quest to rescue Princess Lotus from the Ogress's clutches.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and the Severed Head
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo's adventures are introduced, leading into a scene where a man on horseback discovers a talking severed head in a forest.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo's Encounter with the Ogress

sub_scenes.title: Magical Dagger and Mourning City
sub_scenes.description: The man on horseback receives a magical dagger and travels to a city in mourning, setting the stage for Marco Polo's arrival and involvement.

narrative_arcs.title: The Sacred Dagger and Debt Repayment
The Question of the Knife's Inaction and Farewell

sub_scenes.title: Princess Lotus's Disappearance and The Witch's Castle
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo arrives in Hi-toun, learns of Princess Lotus's disappearance and is diverted by a plea for help, leading him to a witch's castle.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo's Arrival and Royal Welcome
The King's Grief and Princess Lotus's Disappearance
A Plea from a Starving Woman

sub_scenes.title: Ogress's Reveal and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Inside the mysterious castle, the old woman reveals her true form as an Ogress, leading to a confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Mysterious Castle and Strange Children
Confrontation with Monstrous Mice and Sword Drawn

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Hope, and Ogress's Downfall
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo is captured but remembers the magical dagger, using it to defeat the Ogress and escape with Princess Lotus.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of the Special Knife and Hope

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Reunion, and Departure
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo and Princess Lotus escape, return to her father, and Marco declines a reward, continuing his adventures.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape from the Dungeon with the Magic Knife
Arrival and the Misunderstanding of Black Drapes

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Captain Brooking
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells the story of Joseph Jordan's betrayal by Captain Brooking over treasure, his years of imprisonment, and his eventual revenge.

sub_scenes.title: Prologue and the Penal Colony
sub_scenes.description: A prologue introduces a tale of treasure, leading into a scene in a British penal colony.

sub_scenes.title: The Prisoner's Bargain
sub_scenes.description: A prisoner, Joseph Jordan, makes a bargain with Captain Brooking, offering treasure for escape.

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal and Imprisonment
sub_scenes.description: Captain Brooking betrays Jordan, leading to Jordan's imprisonment and years of planning revenge.

sub_scenes.title: Vigil and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Jordan seeks out Brooking, leading to a confrontation and a meeting at Brooking's home.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Resolution at Brooking's Home

sub_scenes.title: Attic Fight and Death
sub_scenes.description: In the attic, Jordan confronts Brooking, leading to a fight and Brooking's death.

narrative_arcs.title: Journey to the Attic and Treasure Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Police Investigation and Moral
sub_scenes.description: The police investigate the gunshot, Jordan attempts to escape, and a moral conclusion is drawn about treasure.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Investigate Shot and Discover Body

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and the Haunted Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Dr. Styx's investigation into the haunted Matthews Estate, his confrontation with the ghost of Vincent Matthews, and the resolution through forgiveness and brotherly love.

sub_scenes.title: Dr. Styx Introduction and Courtroom Sentence
sub_scenes.description: Dr. Styx is introduced in an ominous scene, followed by a courtroom setting where Vincent Matthews is sentenced.

sub_scenes.title: The White Elephant Estate
sub_scenes.description: Henry Northrup consults Dr. Styx about the unsellable, haunted Matthews Estate.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation in the Haunted House
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Northrup enters the haunted house and confronts the ghost of Vincent Matthews.

sub_scenes.title: Fight and Spiritual Interrogation
sub_scenes.description: A physical struggle ensues between Northrup and Matthews, transitioning into a spiritual interrogation.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Attack and Claim of Power
Questioning Violence and Shifting Power Dynamics
Confession of Fear and Societal Position
The Solution of Forgiveness and Love
The Revelation of Rosalind and the Murder

sub_scenes.title: Spiritual Resolution and Departure
sub_scenes.description: Rosalind is summoned, leading to forgiveness, brotherly love, and the spirits' departure, resolving the haunting.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Brotherly Love and Release

Major_Arcs.title: The Voyages of Henry Hudson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts Henry Hudson's ambitious but ultimately tragic voyages to find the Northwest Passage, culminating in mutiny and his unknown fate.

sub_scenes.title: Commission and First Voyage
sub_scenes.description: Henry Hudson is commissioned by the Dutch East India Company for a voyage, leading to his first unsuccessful attempt to find the Northwest Passage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Enigma of Henry Hudson's Fate
The Dutch East India Company's Proposition
Rising Tensions and a Turn Southward
Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Hudson's Resignation and Decision to Return

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage and Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: Hudson embarks on a second voyage, which becomes fraught with challenges, leading to a mutiny by his crew.

narrative_arcs.title: Another Voyage Backed by a New Company
Trapped in Ice and Winter Quarters
The Ice Melts and Disagreement Over Course
Scuffle and Ousting of Captain Hudson
Captain Hudson Set Adrift and Mutineers' Departure

Major_Arcs.title: Hassan the Arabian Knight and the Rescue Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Hassan the Arabian Knight on a mission to rescue a kidnapped woman, facing dangers and combat to fulfill his duty.

sub_scenes.title: The Chase and the Caliph's Summons
sub_scenes.description: Hassan is introduced in a chase, which is revealed to be a consequence of a rescue mission initiated by the Caliph.

narrative_arcs.title: Summoned by the Caliph for a Rescue Mission

sub_scenes.title: Journey and Warnings
sub_scenes.description: Hassan sets off on his mission, encountering signs of the Tartars and receiving warnings about the dangers ahead.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting off to Confront the Tartars

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Detection
sub_scenes.description: Hassan infiltrates the Tartar camp, using disguise but is eventually detected by the soldiers.

narrative_arcs.title: Inside the Tartar Camp and Confirmation of the Daughter
Detection and Confrontation by Tartar Soldiers

sub_scenes.title: Kurgan's Challenge and Combat
sub_scenes.description: Hassan faces Kurgan's interrogation and accepts a challenge to fight for his freedom and the woman's release.

narrative_arcs.title: The Signal and the Start of the Contest
Dirt as a Weapon and Initial Attack
Exploiting the Advantage and Close Combat

sub_scenes.title: Resolution, Farewell, and Romance
sub_scenes.description: Hassan wins the fight, negotiates with Kurgan, and shares emotional farewells and a romantic moment with the rescued woman.
